suncertify.client

Class ClientFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • suncertify.client.ClientFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.event.CaretListener, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class ClientFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, javax.swing.event.CaretListener
    The Main frame of the URLyBird GUI Client that should be instantiated to start the client.

    The client requires a data access object that implements the BookingDB interface in order to communicate with the hotel booking database.

    Author:
    Nick Shrine
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent event)
        Called when an action that raises an ActionEvent is performed on the GUI. In this case if the "search" buttons or "Edit booking" or "Quit" menu items are selected.
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
        Parameters:
        event - the event raised by a GUI action.

      • caretUpdate

        public void caretUpdate(javax.swing.event.CaretEvent event)
        Called when the caret in the search panel text fields is moved. This method checks the contents of the text fields after an edit of the contents and enables the search GUI components if the contents are valid.
        Specified by:
        caretUpdate in interface javax.swing.event.CaretListener
        Parameters:
        event - The event raised by a caret change.

      • search

        protected void search(java.lang.String command)
        This method is called when the Search or Show All buttons are pressed and populates the display table with either the results of the search or all records if the Show All button was pressed.
        Parameters:
        command - the command to be run that determines which records are displayed in the table, either SEARCH or SHOW ALL.
        See Also:
        BookingDB.findExact(java.lang.String[], int)

      • book

        protected void book()
        This method is called to bring up the booking dialog for a reservation when the Book menu item is selected or when a row in the display table is double-clicked on.

        If the current time is too soon before the booking is available for a booking to be allocated to a customer then a message is displayed informing the user of when a booking can be taken.

      • initComponents

        protected void initComponents()
        Lays out the GUI components, sets their behaviour parameters and registers listeners.
